definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

sentences.chinese: 有机芦荟，洋甘菊，金盏草。

sentences.english: Chamomile extract, natural oils and Shea Butter moisturize and nourish the skin.
sentences.chinese: 洋甘菊提取物，天然油和牛油果油滋润和滋养肌肤。

sentences.english: Made with soothing aloe vera and chamomile to detangle and soften damaged hair.
sentences.chinese: 富含芦荟和洋甘菊精华，呵护受损发质。

sentences.english: Roman Chamomile is fruitier and somewhat apple-like in aroma.
sentences.chinese: 罗马洋甘菊的气味是一种淡淡地苹果香气。

sentences.english: Its chamomile , it can prevent allergy .
sentences.chinese: 它是洋甘菊，可以防止过敏。

sentences.english: Use it together with Chamomile Repairing Hair Conditioner for better efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 配合洋甘菊修护护发素使用，效果更佳。

sentences.english: Organic Calendula, Chamomile and White Tea botanicals harmonize and replenish.
sentences.chinese: 有机金盏花，洋甘菊，白茶植物性协调和补充。

sentences.english: Bourbon whiskey, peach liqueur, Fresh orange, mint leaves and chamomile tea.
sentences.chinese: 波本威士忌，桃子糖浆，鲜香橙，薄荷叶，洋甘菊茶。

sentences.english: Organic Calendula, Chamomile and White Tea botanicals harmonize and replenish skin.
sentences.chinese: 有机金盏花，洋甘菊，白茶植物药协调和补充肌肤。

sentences.english: In some regions, fields of chamomile lie.
sentences.chinese: 在一些地区，领域的洋甘菊谎言。
